mapper.select: SELECT ROL.ROL_ID AS ROL_ID, ROL.ROL_NAME AS ROL_NAME, ROL.ROL_DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION FROM TDS1ADM.ACC_ROL_RELA ARR LEFT JOIN TDS1ADM.ROLE ROL ON ARR.ROL_ID = ROL.ROL_ID WHERE ARR.ACC_ID = #{accId}
SELECT t.AUT_ID id, t.AUT_KEY key FROM tds1adm.authority t WHERE t.AUT_VALUE = 'true' and t.ROL_ID in(${roleIds})
